education.description: Focused on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Thesis on neural network optimization.
Graduated with honors. Active member of the coding club and participated in several hackathons.

experiences.description: Leading a team to develop a new cloud-based SaaS platform. Responsible for architecture, code reviews, and mentoring junior developers.
Worked on the backend services for a large-scale data processing pipeline. Improved system efficiency by 20%.
